abstract: Mr. Levine’s easily accessible explanations of monetary policy made the economy a staple of television news.
snippet: Mr. Levine’s easily accessible explanations of monetary policy made the economy a staple of television news.
lead_paragraph: Irving R. Levine, the longtime NBC News correspondent whose easily accessible explanations of monetary policy, fluctuations in the Dow Jones industrial average and the intricacies of the global market helped make the economy a staple of television news, died in Washington on Friday. He was 86 and lived in Washington and Boca Raton, Fla.

headline.main: Irving R. Levine, NBC News Correspondent, Dies at 86
headline.print_headline: Irving R. Levine, 86; Made Economy Simple
